com.netflix.logging.log4jAdapter
Class NFPatternParser

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.log4j.helpers.PatternParser
      com.netflix.logging.log4jAdapter.NFPatternParser

public class NFPatternParser
extends org.apache.log4j.helpers.PatternParser

A custom parser class that provides a better performing implementation than the one in log4j for finding location information such as class, line number etc.
